line.originaltext: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves")

line.originaltext: 1 (1.27 ounce) packet dry fajita seasoning, divided
line.annotation: create_ing(ing1, "1 (1.27 ounce) packet dry fajita seasoning, divided")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
line.annotation: create_ing(ing2, "1 tablespoon vegetable oil")

line.originaltext: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained")

line.originaltext: 1 (11 ounce) can Mexican-style corn
line.annotation: create_ing(ing4, "1 (11 ounce) can Mexican-style corn")

line.originaltext: 1/2 cup salsa
line.annotation: create_ing(ing5, "1/2 cup salsa")

line.originaltext: 1 (10 ounce) package mixed salad greens
line.annotation: create_ing(ing6, "1 (10 ounce) package mixed salad greens")

line.originaltext: 1 onion, chopped
line.annotation: create_ing(ing7, "1 onion, chopped")

line.originaltext: 1 tomato, cut into wedges
line.annotation: create_ing(ing8, "1 tomato, cut into wedges")

line.originaltext: Rub chicken evenly with 1/2 the fajita seasoning.
line.annotation: separate(ing1, ing9, "1/2 fajita seasoning", ing10, "1/2 fajita seasoning", "")

line.originaltext: Rub chicken evenly with 1/2 the fajita seasoning.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing10}, ing11, "seasoned chicken", "rub chicken with seasoning")

line.originaltext: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and cook the chicken 8 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear; set aside.
line.annotation: create_tool(t0, "skillet")

line.originaltext: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and cook the chicken 8 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear; set aside.
line.annotation: cook(ing2, t0, ing12, "hot oil", "")

line.originaltext: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and cook the chicken 8 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear; set aside.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing12}, ing13, "cooked chicken", "8 minutes on each side or until juices run clear")

line.originaltext: In a large saucepan, mix beans, corn, salsa and other 1/2 of fajita seasoning.
line.annotation: create_tool(t1, "large saucepan")

line.originaltext: In a large saucepan, mix beans, corn, salsa and other 1/2 of fajita seasoning.
line.annotation: combine({ing3, ing4, ing5, ing9}, ing14, "beans, corn, salsa, seasoned", "")

line.originaltext: Heat over medium heat until warm.
line.annotation: cook(ing14, t1, ing15, "warmed beans, corn, salsa", "")

line.originaltext: Prepare the salad by tossing the greens, onion and tomato.
line.annotation: combine({ing6, ing7, ing8}, ing16, "salad", "toss")

line.originaltext: Top salad with chicken and dress with the bean and corn mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing15, ing16}, ing17, "chicken fiesta salad", "toss together")

line.originaltext: Top salad with chicken and dress with the bean and corn mixture.
line.annotation: serve(ing17,"")
